$kinesisClient = new Aws\Kinesis\KinesisClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2013-12-02',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

$name = "my_stream_name";

try {
    $result = $kinesisClient->describeStream([
        'StreamName' => $name,
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
